p: Understanding incubation periods is very important as it allows health authorities to introduce more effective quarantine systems for suspected cases. The best current estimates of the SARS-CoV-2 infection range from 2 to 14 days. Analysis of the first 425 cases of COVID-19 in Wuhan a mean incubation period of 5.2 days [ 41]. A later report, based on 1324 cases, reported a mean incubation period of 3.0 days [ 42]. Yet another report, on 88 cases who traveled to Wuhan between 20 and 28 January, had incubation period ranges from 2.1 to 11.1 days, with a mean of 6.4 days [ 43].
